biotools.summary: Tool designed for biologists, its main function is to search for the cis-elements (nucleotides) that regulate the genes for a bacteria specie, assuming that one usually consider that a cis sequence regulates a gene if it is oriented in the same direction and if it is localized in a user-specified interval regarding to the beginning of the gene.

bioschemas.name: Predector
bioschemas.summary: Tool designed for biologists, its main function is to search for the cis-elements (nucleotides) that regulate the genes for a bacteria specie, assuming that one usually consider that a cis sequence regulates a gene if it is oriented in the same direction and if it is localized in a user-specified interval regarding to the beginning of the gene.
